text: Panax pseudoginseng is a species of the genus Panax. Common names include Pseudoginseng, Nepal ginseng, and Himalayan ginseng. Pseudoginseng belongs to the same scientific genus as ginseng. In Latin, the word panax means "cure- all", and the family of ginseng plants is one of the best-known herbs. ==See also== * Panax notoginseng ==References== pseudoginseng Category:Plants used in traditional Chinese medicine
title: Panax pseudoginseng
